home-hero-section.subtitle: RariMe lives right In your MetaMask. It’s where you securely keep, manage your credentials, attestations, social identity, licenses, event tickets, and more — all in one place
home-hero-section.description: *The RariMe snap guarantees user control by never accessing the Private Key
home-hero-section.card-text-1: Add social identity and manage directly from the wallet

home-banner.text-1: to preserve full user control, the Private Key is
home-banner.text-bold: never accessed by The RariMe snap.
home-banner.text-2: Even if the wallet is unlocked or compromised, the PK cannot be stolen.

how-install.question: How to install RariMe Snap
how-install.answer: Click “Instal RariМe” on rarime.com and follow the instructions

what-does-do.question: What does the RariMe Snap do?
what-does-do.answer: RariMe Snap allows users to store and manage identity credentials through their MetaMask wallet; they can generate credentials, protect their privacy by generating Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs) of these credentials, and submit these ZKPs to dApps

what-does-not-do.question: What does the snap NOT do?
what-does-not-do.answer: RariMe Snap does not have access to users’ private keys or crypto assets

how-to-use-features.question: How to use RariMe Snaps’ features
how-to-use-features.answer: RariMe has four key features. It allows users to 1) receive credentials 2) create Zero Knowledge Proofs of their credentials and 3) submit proof to DApps. For each of these steps, users will be automatically prompted by the identity providers and the dApps that have integrated with RariMe.

reach-out-support.question: How do I reach out for snap support?
reach-out-support.answer: Visit the Rarimo Discord support channel or send an email to igor@rarifylabs.com

what-can-store.question: What credentials can I store in my RariMe Snap Wallet?
what-can-store.answer: Any Verifiable Credentials issued by identity providers that use Rarimo Protocol

what-chains-used-on.question: What chains can I use RariMe Snap credentials on?
what-chains-used-on.answer: Ethereum, Avax, Polygon, and BNB Chain

how-identity-credentials-available.question: How can identity providers make their credentials available to RariMe Snap users?
how-identity-credentials-available.answer: Set up a Rarimo credentials issuer module

what-apps-can-use.question: What applications can I use RariMe Snap on?
what-apps-can-use.answer: Galxe, QuestN, and Zealy via the Rarimo PoH (Proof of human) plug-in

home-tiles-section.tile-1-description: Disclose ony what you need, whenever you need (Selective disclosure, ZKPs)
home-tiles-section.tile-2-description: Use your social identity cross-chain and connect to different dApps seamlessly
home-tiles-section.tile-3-description: Safeguard your personal data by keeping it encrypted and under your control at all times
home-tiles-section.tile-4-description: Manage all your credentials in one simple dashboard
